Description.Text:
Property Location
Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is in the heart of Lyon, walking distance from Theatre des Celestins and Bellecour Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Quai Tilsit Vaporetto Stop and Lyon Courthouse.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 78 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets allowed
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is in the heart of Lyon, walking distance from Theatre des Celestins and Bellecour Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Quai Tilsit Vaporetto Stop and Lyon Courthouse.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Theatre des Celestins - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Bellecour Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Quai Tilsit Vaporetto Stop - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Lyon Courthouse - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St. Jean Cathedral - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Lyon Museum of Fine Arts - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Lyon City Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Lyon History Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Lyon Opera - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Terreaux Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Guignol Theater - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Quai de Bondy Vaporetto Stop - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Textile Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
University of Lyon II - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Saint Martin d'Ainay Abbey - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Lyon (XYD-Part-Dieu SNCF Train Station) - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Lyon (LYN-Lyon Bron) - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 18.9 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Lyon Centre Plaza République is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Lyon Centre Republique is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 19 km / 11.8 mi.
